html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09022018-06-22JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectRight Hon. Beverley M. McLachlin ** Removal Allowance **
PrecisOrder prescribing pursuant to subsection 3.2(9) of the Judges Act (Removal Allowance), the period from May 8, 2018 to November 7, 2018 as an additional period during which the difference between the sale price of the former residence of the Right Honourable BEVERLEY M. MCLACHLIN and its fair market value shall be prescribed, pursuant to subsection 3.2(2) of that Order, to be an expense for which a removal allowance shall be paid under section 40 of the Judges Act.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Right Hon. Beverley M. McLachlin ** Removal Allowance **

MCLACHLIN and its fair market value shall be prescribed, pursuant to subsection 3.2(2) of that Order, to be an expense for which a removal allowance shall be paid under section 40 of the Judges Act.
